          <title>
            <string language="en">Speed of the ball</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschwindigkeit der Kugel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Vitesse de la boule</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Velocidade da esfera</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Velocità della sfera</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ταχύτητα της σφαίρας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Velocidad de la bola</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that the speed of the ball thrown up and as it falls down is the same.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Acceleration</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ball</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">direction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">opposite direction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Speed</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">velocity</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß die Geschwindigkeit 
der Kugel, die oben geworfen wird und als sie ist unten dieselbe 
fällt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que la vitesse de la 
boule soulevée et en tant qu'elle tombe est vers le bas identique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que a velocidade da 
esfera jogada acima e como ela cai é para baixo a mesma.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che la velocità 
della sfera sollevata e come esso cade è la stessa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι η ταχύτητα της σφαίρας
που ρίχνεται επάνω και δεδομένου ότι πτώσεις είναι κάτω το 
ίδιο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que baja la velocidad de 
la bola lanzada para arriba y como ella abajo es igual.</string>
          </description>
